vignette.name: Finding Objects in Jitter
vignette.bodytext:
There are several ways to find an object that you might need for adding video and OpenGL functionality. You can find a list of all Jitter objects in functional groups using the Jitter Objects by Function page . If you want to just see all the Jitter objects in alphabetical order, you might prefer the Jitter Objects A-Z page.
The Max Object Thesaurus helps you find objects (in Max, MSP and Jitter) based on some key words and phrases. This is a great place to find objects based on what you wish to accomplish.
In addition, you can often find help on our website, in our user forum and in the Jitter Tutorials.
